support.contactDescription: Get in touch with our team

hero.description: Built for gamers who want smoother, faster gameplay. IQ Optimizer boosts FPS and fine-tunes your system, no upgrades needed.

welcome.subtitle: Get the Best Out of Your Setup
welcome.description: Your PC might be slow not from weak hardware, but from how Windows handles it. IQ Optimizer clears what holds it back, boosts responsiveness, and makes everything run smoother, especially in games. No upgrades needed. Just smarter performance in one click.

networkOptimizer.title: Network Optimizer
networkOptimizer.description: Prioritizes gaming traffic and stabilizes your connection for lower ping and fewer lag spikes.

fpsBoost.title: FPS Boost Engine
fpsBoost.description: Maximizes frame rates by reallocating system resources and stopping non-essential background tasks.

systemCleanup.title: Real-Time System Clean-Up
systemCleanup.description: Frees up RAM and CPU by disabling unnecessary processes while you play — no manual setup.

windowsTuning.title: Windows Tuning
windowsTuning.description: Adjusts Windows settings that typically bottleneck performance — from power plans to visual effects.
